conversation.message_text: Montblanc: Discover the latest leather creations from our Spring/Summer 2026 Collection. Explore now: montblanc.attn.tv/avlPfKKlFIfx
Montblanc: This Valentine's Day, write from the heart to accompany a gift for someone you love. Explore now: montblanc.attn.tv/apPCIOl8rfC6
Montblanc: Hi Ashna, this is Sarah. Thanks for visiting Montblanc.com. Are you looking for anything in particular today? https://montblanc.attn.tv/asixUlVCIjnQ
Hi Sarah, yes

Montblanc: Thank you for reaching out. That's fantastic. May I know what item you are looking for so I can assist you further?

Also, you can check out our new arrivals here: https://montblanc.attn.tv/a94zaL0RqHOA
I am looking at the Pix black ball point pen in Navy blue. I want to pick it up from the store tomorrow because i want to gift it to my husband as an anniversary present

Montblanc: That's amazing! Happy anniversary to both of you. Sure, let me helo you. During the checkout process select "Pick up in boutique" and choose which boutique you would like to have your order delivered to. You will receive an email as soon as your order is ready to be picked up at the boutique.

In order to pick up your order, you will need to bring with you a valid ID and the shipping confirmation email (printed or on a mobile device).

Also, you can find us near you here: https://montblanc.attn.tv/aIst8nPfMKwP
Is the pickup going to happen at the same day?

Montblanc: Thanks for asking! Same-day pickup could be possible if the item is in stock at the boutique you choose and your order is placed early. In any case, you will receive an email as soon as your order is ready to be picked up.

Please let me know how I can assist you further today, I'm just a text away!

send_to_cs: If escalated do NOT send to CS
escalate: ESC if a cx wants to purchase an out of stock item
ESC if cx want someone from the cs team to call them directly
ESC when a cx asks for a call back
ESC if uncertain about refills or product specific questions
ESC if cx has issues registering
ESC if cx asks for help putting through an order
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Don't use too many exclamation points
Use more formal language such as "Hello" instead of "Hey"
Avoid responding to anything related to politics
dos_and_don_ts: Always use your VPN when accessing their website & make sure you're sending US links
Don't ever release information on personnel related to the company
Don't share any authorized retailers, only boutiques
Don't ask cx to leave product reviews as they don't collect them
drive_to_purchase: When D2P'ing, do not send links of the search results page, send either a related collection or product page

I'm having an issue please help I tried to add money to the card and it's not letting me purchase

SNIPES: Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear that. Are you trying to use a prepaid card for your purchase? If yes, then our system accepts some cards and may reject others, so if it doesn't go through at checkout, unfortunately, it can't be used as a payment method. Do you have a credit card you could try instead?
I put money on the card Now it won't let me finish purchasing and all I was $10 more what am I doing wrong . I would actually like my money refunded so I could just buy it straight out with my debit

SNIPES: I'm sorry to hear that! Since the order was not placed yet, we're not able to do any refunds. Please use a different card at checkout to finish placing your order. Thank you for your cooperation.
But I put money on the snipes card

SNIPES: My sincere apologies for the inconvenience! Are you referring to a gift card? We currently do not offer the option of using gift cards online. Gift cards can only be used at any of our SNIPES retail stores.
I put money on the snipes reserve card
I've been trying to find a phone number I can call to get in touch with somebody It's so hard to explain anything on text messaging

conversation.message_text: tentree: Going Fast: Up to 50% Off In-Season Styles. Catch these newly marked-down faves while you can. Shop Now: tentree.attn.tv/aubYvTtAhd_O
tentree: New year, new layers. Stay warm with sustainable pieces made to move and last all season. Shop Now: tentree.attn.tv/awpe8fuQQTcO

tentree: The styles that built us. Shop best sellers & plant 10 trees with every item. tentree.attn.tv/aOMCquDR_PRh 

STOP to cancel.
tentree: The Driftwood Dress is still available, don't miss out! Complete your purchase now: tentree.attn.tv/ayRxgcl2qiMY

tentree: These best sellers make an impact-on your wardrobe and the planet. Shop Now: tentree.attn.tv/a2lWXYNhriw1 

STOP to cancel.
(attn) Hey, I need help with something:

My order number #622902 was placed weeks ago.  I live in PA and have ordered many times from Tentree.  My order tracked east, but then somehow ended up in Arizona.  OnTrack says that there's a weather delay, but my package has been in Arizona now for over a week with no progress.  I'm getting concerned that it's been lost.  OnTrack tracking # is D10017111665262. Please help me to understand what might be going on.  Many thanks, Catherine Levengood üôè

tentree: I'm sorry to hear about the issue you're experiencing with your order. I checked, and your package has been delayed due to the weather. 

Since the package is already with the carrier, it's best to contact them directly to get the most updated status. Have you tried reaching out to Ontrac? They should have the most up-to-date information: https://tentree.attn.tv/aVjuNiKxbw6W/

I have been following their updates.  I understand that winter weather is not the best in the U.S. right now, but there really should be no reason for the order to progress east, then end up in Arizona, stalled there for over a week. Ontrac has shown zero progression of my order in over a week.

tentree: I completely understand your concern, Catherine, and I'm really sorry for the delay. I can check on this with our team to see if we can get more clarity. Could you please confirm the email address used for the order?
catherinelevengood@yahoo.com
I definitely appreciate your help.

tentree: Thanks! Let me check on this for you. It's a little late, so it's likely I won't hear back by today, though rest assured, I'll reach out once business hours resume.

send_to_cs: Send to CS for coupon code requests
escalate: Always include the cx name & email in your ESC notes

dos_and_don_ts: They don't offer callbacks, don't suggest this to cx
promo_and_promo_exclusions: SuperCircle Credits can be used at any time on any items (regular, discounted/on sale) and even during sitewide sales
SuperCircle Credits can't be combined with another discount code at the same time
Customers can apply discount codes to items that are on sale if its a discount code specific to the sale.
